text.more: Data sourced from 'Quaker International Conferences Participants Directory: Programs in Asia, Europe and U.S.A.: 1952-1976' and 'Conferences for diplomats: Programs in Europe, Asia, U.S.A. and Africa: conference membership 1952-1965' held by Friends House Library, London
text.intro: This interactive visualiser displays details of African trainees who attended international diplomatic training programmes for newly independent states from 1960-1980.
text.title: Diplomatic Training Network Visualiser
